title: Ultimate Buds
description: A comedy about a group of friends going through life, work, and relationships together.
quote: And I forgot the grey mush!
altHero: a man and woman in a trendy Friends-like apartment
alt1: the woman gives the man a look
alt2: the woman turns and is shocked at someone at the door
alt3: another guy joins them, holding a cross bow
alt4: the original guy shrugs comedically with grey mush all over his sweater
